meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Lead</kanji> <kanji>poison</kanji> is <vocabulary>lead toxicity</vocabulary>.

This word generally refers to the toxicity of lead. While it can also refer to <vocabulary>lead poisoning</vocabulary>, 鉛中毒 (なまりちゅうどく) is the more common word for that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
